attributes.action: stop the repatriation of prisoners found guilty of crimes in foreign countries unless there is compelling evidence of their innocence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am very angry that drug traffickers held in foreign countries are being repatriated to serve sentences here.  At £80,000 per annum per prisoner the burden is an insult to hard working families, particularly in the present economic climate.
